summary: Runes on the nightingale sword with glow map!
descriptionHtml:
Update: V1.1 is now up with a functioning glow map for the sword, enjoy!
/PV__86

---------------------------------------------------------------

Decided that I would add some runes to the Nightingale sword. This is how it came out =)

The runes on the blade say \"Dinok Do Fin Vulon\" which translates to \"Death of the Night\".
Added the strong cyan color to make it seem like it\'s glowing a bit.

Unfortunately one side of the sword will have the runes mirrored, the side facing away from the player in fps mode that is. Didn\'t feel up to the challenge to mess around with the meshes just yet ^^

However, hope you guys like it, so enjoy!

ps. Big thanks to Bethesda for a great game.
author: Squirrel86
